name: OR_LOG_POSTOPDX
description: The OR_LOG_POSTOPDX table contains OR management system log postop diagnoses.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the post-op diagnosis information for the log.

columns.name: POST_OP_DX
columns.description: The post-op diagnosis of the log.
